benefits.purifyAir: Naturally purifies indoor air by absorbing harmful toxins
benefits.naturalDecor: Adds natural beauty and greenery to your living space
benefits.lowMaintenance: Easy to care for with minimal attention required
benefits.filterWater: Filters and cleans water naturally through bioprocesses
benefits.indicatorHealth: Acts as a natural indicator of water ecosystem health
benefits.digitalReadings: Digital sensors with accurate real-time readings

peaceLily.name: Peace Lily (Spathiphyllum)
peaceLily.description: Excellent air purifier that removes formaldehyde, benzene, and carbon monoxide. Easy to care for and blooms beautiful white flowers.

spiderPlant.name: Spider Plant (Chlorophytum)
spiderPlant.description: NASA-approved air purifier. Removes formaldehyde and xylene. Produces baby plants that can be easily propagated.

snakePlant.name: Snake Plant (Sansevieria)
snakePlant.description: One of the best air purifiers. Converts CO2 to oxygen at night. Very drought tolerant and low maintenance.

bostonFern.name: Boston Fern (Nephrolepis)
bostonFern.description: Natural humidifier and air purifier. Excellent for removing formaldehyde and adding moisture to dry air.

waterHyacinth.name: Water Hyacinth (Eichhornia)
waterHyacinth.description: Aquatic plant that absorbs heavy metals and nutrients from water. Effective for water purification.

duckweed.name: Duckweed (Lemna)
duckweed.description: Tiny floating plant that rapidly absorbs nutrients and indicates water quality through growth patterns.

hornwort.name: Hornwort (Ceratophyllum)
hornwort.description: Fast-growing aquatic plant that absorbs excess nutrients and produces oxygen. Excellent for maintaining water clarity.

najas.name: Najas (Najas guadalupensis)
najas.description: Submerged aquatic plant that helps control algae and absorbs nitrates. Creates natural filtration in water bodies.

ramshornSnails.name: Ramshorn Snails (Planorbidae)
ramshornSnails.description: Beneficial aquatic mollusks that consume algae and organic waste. Natural indicators of water quality and ecosystem health.

basicKit.name: Basic Air Quality Kit
basicKit.description: Starter kit with digital air quality monitor and 2 air-purifying plants. Perfect for beginners.

advancedKit.name: Advanced Environmental Kit
advancedKit.description: Complete monitoring solution with digital sensors for air and water, plus 4 monitoring plants.

proKit.name: Professional Monitoring Kit
proKit.description: Industrial-grade sensors with mobile app connectivity. Real-time data logging and analysis.

about.title: About EcoMonitor
about.subtitle: Empowering communities with real-time environmental data for a healthier, sustainable Uzbekistan.
about.heroDescription: EcoMonitor is a comprehensive environmental monitoring platform that helps citizens of Uzbekistan track air quality, water conditions, weather patterns, and receive personalized health recommendations.
about.featuresSubtitle: Discover all the tools and capabilities that EcoMonitor offers to help you monitor and improve your environment

airQuality.title: Air Quality Monitoring
airQuality.desc: Real-time AQI data from IQAir and local stations. Track PM2.5, PM10, ozone, and other pollutants across 14+ cities in Uzbekistan.

waterQuality.title: Water Quality Index
waterQuality.desc: Monitor water quality parameters including pH levels, dissolved oxygen, and contamination indicators for safe water usage.

weather.title: Weather Data
weather.desc: Live weather updates including temperature, humidity, wind speed, UV index, and precipitation forecasts from OpenWeatherMap.

map.title: Interactive Map
map.desc: Visual representation of environmental data across Uzbekistan. Click on any city to see detailed local conditions.

ai.title: AI Environmental Advisor
ai.desc: Get personalized recommendations and answers to your environmental questions powered by advanced AI technology.

analytics.title: Data Analytics
analytics.desc: Historical trends, charts, and statistical analysis. Export data in CSV or JSON formats for your research.

about.missionText: To provide accessible, real-time environmental data to residents of Uzbekistan, empowering informed decisions for healthier living.
about.dataSourcesText: We integrate data from IQAir, OpenWeatherMap, AQICN, and local monitoring stations to provide comprehensive environmental insights.
about.methodologyText: Our data processing follows international standards (WHO, EPA) with real-time validation, caching, and AI-powered analysis.

privacyItems.minimal: We collect minimal personal data necessary for service operation
privacyItems.anonymized: Environmental sensor data is anonymized and aggregated
privacyItems.noSell: We do not sell or share personal information with third parties
privacyItems.encrypted: All data transmission is encrypted using industry-standard protocols
privacyItems.deletion: Users can request data deletion at any time
